Topic.Title: More attacks on US Embassies under Obama and Hillary since....

Message.Msg: what's the point of discussing the number of attacks on US under different presidents? More to the point is how we react to such attacks. Bush reacted in ways people expect their president to react. Obama?

Topic.Title: Bush is the king of attacks on US embassies and consulates.(contrary to poophead liars & losers)

Message.Msg: Neither Bush nor Reagan stood by in real time and watched our embassy people being murdered and choose to do nothing. Neither Bush nor Reagan lied about it later and tried to cover it up. Ooops! I forgot! Barack Obama was supposedly ASLEEP at the time!

Topic.Title: More attacks on US Embassies under Obama and Hillary since....

Message.Msg: Neither Bush nor Reagan stood by and watched, in real time, while our embassy staff members were murdered. Oh, I forgot! Barack Obama was ASLEEP! Maybe MEDICATED asleep! Neither Bush nor Reagan tried to cover up the fact that they were too doped up to do their job and respond to an embassy attack!

Topic.Title: More attacks on US Embassies under Obama and Hillary since....

Message.Msg: Remember that Hillary campaign ad: Who would you want answering the phone for a 3:00AM emergency? NOT Barack Obama!!!!!

Message.Msg: One plan to stop future embassy attack would be to impeach Obama NOW!

Message.Title: WH photo of Obama shooting skeet with 12 guage
Message.Msg: Assuming the photo is authentic, I think it's great. What do you libs think? I think that the most leftist among them would be appalled.
Don't worry about dumbbuttuuuu, Yahoo permanently suspended him for being a DA. If a post does get thru, it gets zapped in minutes, same with messy. They are germs, not welcome.

Message.Title: Love This One
Message.Msg: A welcome sign in Virginia Attention criminals -terrorists Virginia is protected by a legally armed citizens militia. Trained and prepared to defend this commonwealth. On duty 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. You have been warned However, Maryland and DC have been disarmed for your convenience.

Dumbutuuuuuuu has been haunting this mesg board for at least a decade, under different yahoo ids. I am surprised yahoo permanently banned him. He has access to at least two computers with different IP addresses. I am sure of that. I thought messybrains & delucks345 were the same poster: old ID new ID. Sort of. Although delucks345 seems less pleasant. I am (almost) sure he is a paid political poster. I could be wrong about that. At one point I was sure he was posting anti-American stuff from Iraq. Maybe he was just a relay. Maybe now that Obama is supreme emperor, issuing executive proclamations, maybe Obama doesn't need to pay political hack posters anymore. Just guessing. Both of these guys have been around longer than I have been on this msg board. (And I've been here, with different yahoo IDs for maybe 8 years.) I've been off lately. Kind of too depressed to continue after the November elections. It's like, what's the point? Cry the Beloved Country!

Do you realize that if Obama issues an executive order that permanently does away with our US Constitution, if the Congress (and its Democrat Senate) does not repudiate it within 90 days, our Constitution is HISTORY! Or maybe he could have some regulatory agency do it for him. Same result. What bunch of nincompoops in Congress allowed that to be true?

As it is, Obama is blatantly issuing executive orders, that he knows are unconstitutional and Harry Reid and the gang of fascists in the Senate will not block, and they become LAW in 90 days! Who needs a stupid Constitution (or Congress) anyway? Not Obama and the Democrats.

Sweet heart, they are all Democrats and all in the US Senate! I think the correct Spanish word is "putas." My Spanish-English dictionnary doesn't return a translation for "putanas" although that may be slang for a different region.

messy and deluks are the same goon. Who else uses 200 year old news to make a point. It's easy to detect his babbling, it never changes. Same with dropkick. I rarely have exchanges with either of them, when they start a thread, it gets zapped along with any replies. To quote you, It's like what's the point?

What they're doing is comparing Sept-2012 (142.974 million) to Jan-2013 (143.322 million) and getting 338 thousand jobs and claiming that averages to 150 thousand jobs per month. Well, lets see: Oct, Nov, Dec, Jan = 4 (four!) months 348 thousand / 4 = about 87 thousand jobs per month, not 150 thousand. (They are getting that number from some other report!) Next I will hear how its all Bush's fault! Or that things would be worse if it weren't for the Stimulus Package. *** WHAT DOES IT MATTER? Companies are slashing jobs, reporting record earnings, stocks are ON FIRE!!. Some stocks are hitting 60 year highs. SUCK ON THAT! OBAMA RULES!!! GOP will be eliminated in 2014 and Obama will assume total control. DOW 16,000!

Do you realize that if Obama issues an executive order that permanently does away with our US Constitution, he could be re-elected to a third term. In fact, we wouldn't need expensive and negative elections. What are you complaining about. Uncle Ben will not allow a market correction of more than a couple %. You can't lose. Put it all in the stock market. Obama market will go up for 4 more years. It's a no brainer. Shut up and be happy.
